introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we specialize in designing, configuring, and optimizing no-code workflows for startups, SMEs, and enterprises. We set up integrations between apps (e.g., CRMs, databases, ERPs, email tools, APIs), create automated triggers, and ensure your workflows run smoothly at scale.
This allows your business to save time, reduce costs, and test ideas faster, all without writing a single line of code.

case_study_section.headline: Zapier Automation Cut HR Work by 70%

problem.label: Problem
problem.text: An HR department manually onboarded new hires by sending emails, creating accounts, and adding them to tools.

solution.label: Solution
solution.text: We built an automation on Zapier that triggered on new hire forms, automatically created accounts in HR software, sent welcome emails, and added them to Slack.

result.label: Result
result.text: HR onboarding time reduced by 70%, saving ~20 hours per month.

questions.question: Which tools can you automate?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: Will automation replace my team?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: How much time can automation save?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: Do you create AI agents?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
